name: Perfect 40-Minute Incline Walk (Personalized)
author: ChatGPT (based on user's inputs)

steps.name: Warm-up
steps.notes: Slow steady warm-up to raise core temperature and prepare muscles.

steps.name: Main steady - block 1
steps.notes: Sustained Zone 2–3 effort for fat-burning and aerobic conditioning.

steps.name: Main steady - block 2
steps.notes: Slightly higher intensity to raise cardiac stimulus while remaining steady-state.

steps.name: Optional finish (accelerator)
steps.notes: Optional 5-minute spike for increased calorie burn and cardiovascular load.

steps.name: Cooldown (suggested)
steps.notes: Gradual decline of speed and incline to return heart rate toward resting. (Post-treadmill stretching recommended.)

notes: Designed for steady-state incline walking with occasional short intensity spikes. Adjust speeds/incline to keep heart rate in target ranges.
